attributes.title: HORRIBLE. DO NOT GET THIS APP!
attributes.review: After downloading this app my entire phone started glitching out and becoming really slow. Nearly every time i try to open the app is crashes, and on the rare occasions when it does open, it is very slow and glitchy.

attributes.title: Glitchy app
attributes.review: Im not a gen z. This app made my phone malfunction and start overheating. I downloaded it to support our president trump but unfortunately this app has made me rethink my choices. DO NOT GET THIS APP. Remove it from the app store. It will cause your phone to overheat and blow up. I’m warning every trump fan out there.

attributes.title: Barron T.
attributes.review:
I was super excited for this app!! But as soon as I opened it my phone fell into the toilet and my phone broke but I put it in rice and it’s okay now so then I opened it back up and then the app told me that I’m stupid and now I’m in the corner writing this because I’m crying... 

We will spare your app if you spare TikTok. ANYWAYSSS ACAB, BLM.

attributes.title: Bad!
attributes.review: This app is probably one of the least helpful apps out there. Very difficult to use and not to mention it is riddled with Cheeto fingers. I would much rather never use this app again and I advise everyone not to use it either.

attributes.title: This app keeps making my phone crash
attributes.review: I had to reboot my phone several times because of this app it’s over heating my phone it’s glitching so much and causing my phone to crash I would rate it 0 stars 💯 just ridiculous

attributes.title: This app is not user friendly
attributes.review:
It is so complicated & will make your phone crash.
It’s definitely a no❤️ from me. 
But not surprised one bit by the quality of this app, this is kind of what I expected based on the reason for it.

attributes.title: horrible 😋❤️✨
attributes.review: i seriously do not accept this app. it honestly has had such a negative impact on my life and prevented me from living it normally. it constantly puts me down saying that i in fact, am a loser. i do not condone this type of behavior towards me or my peers. as tik tok is shutting down, this app is just as bad. unacceptable. i’m truly disgusted with how this app is in so many peoples phones. if you or a loved one has this app, i suggest you delete it immediately. this is a disease that needs to be stopped! gen z forever

attributes.title: Is this on purpose??
attributes.review: Ever since downloading my phone has been almost hacked it seems, randomly opening web pages I never went on and lagging extremely bad every time the app is open. AND it won’t let me delete it ?!?

attributes.title: CANCEL TRUMP
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in the hopes of supporting my President but all I saw was a tangerine with a wig on then when I adventured more into the app it was very glitchy and over all not good this app doesn’t help you say your thoughts or opinions at all either fix your app or delete it thank you 🙃✨

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP!
attributes.review: First of all, this app took 2 days to download. I am incapable of swiping my screen to click a different app. So I was SO bored. While the app was downloading, it was playing this TERRIBLE music that scared my pet rat named Patricia. She then froze and stopped moving. I brought her to the vet and she was dead.😱😭rip Patricia fly high angel🕊
